poster: M U C K F A R C
title: Trying out Twitch, Check it Out!
body:
Hey Guys,

I'm trying out Twitch, pretty new to it! I'd rather play around on Twitch than do my assignments.
I have pretty nice playlists and stream quality gameplay!
I also play Hearthstone and Paladins

I'm always open for improvements! 
CHECK IT OUT! & Please no hate! 

Thanks Y'all !
{{champion:36}}
